prop.name: validFor
prop.desc: The time validity of the permit.

prop.name: validUntil
prop.desc: The date when the item is no longer valid.

prop.name: validFrom
prop.desc: The date when the item becomes valid.

prop.name: issuedBy
prop.desc: The organization issuing the ticket or permit.

prop.name: issuedThrough
prop.desc: The service through with the permit was granted.

prop.name: permitAudience
prop.desc: The target audience for this permit.

prop.name: validIn
prop.desc: The geographic area where the permit is valid.
